deal.product_description:
Title: Refurbished Samsung Galaxy S22+ 256 GB Unlocked  
Category: Electronics  
Brand: Samsung  
Description: A refurbished unlocked Galaxy S22+ with 256 GB storage running Android.  
Details: Features a 6.6‑inch display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset, 50 MP main camera, 12 MP secondary camera, 10 MP front camera, and comes with a one‑year Allstate warranty.

Title: Refurbished Apple iPhone 15 Pro 128 GB  
Category: Electronics  
Brand: Apple  
Description: A premium, refurbished iPhone 15 Pro featuring iOS, advanced camera, and high‑performance silicon.  
Details: Includes 128 GB storage, unlocked for worldwide carriers, and restored to near‑new condition.

Title: Refurbished Samsung Galaxy S22 5G  
Category: Electronics  
Brand: Samsung  
Description: 5G unlocked smartphone with flagship specs and a 6.1‑inch AMOLED display.  
Details: Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 128 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, 108 MP rear camera, 40 MP front camera, running Android with Bixby and Google Assistant.
